reviewText: Good series but no concluding end. If the series don't have a good elaborate end I can't give it 5 stars. A series like Golden Time, have 5 stars.

It's the second half of the masterpiece that is The Pet Girl of Sakurasou. If you liked the first half, you'll want to see this. If you didn't like the first half, there's probably something wrong with you.

This is not a dub. It's just a Blu-Ray version of what you can watch free on Crunchyroll, subtitles and all. This means no English language for you, which may alienate some potential fans(including a couple of friends of mine), but at least Sentai didn't butcher the dub like they've been doing for other series lately, which is why I gave it 3 stars instead of 2.

full of love comedy and a shy girl who outclasses them all. this is a series where someone is extremely good at one thing but horrid at all else. in this season there a surpassing twist that makes all help seem lost but when you don't give up you achieve. most definatly worth every penny.

Love Pet Girl of Sakurasou!!! Love it just great if you want to see it, PLease do so, it's touching and every character is so awesome and you can relate to each one base on daily things in life. Overall love the series and i wish for more!!

this is the 2nd part of the show

Japaneses name: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo

Rating 9.5/10

Genera: Comedy, Drama, Romance, School

Summary:
A boy is forced to live in a a dorm for weird people because he picked up a stray cat, one day a girl moves in, who cant take care of herself, so he is forced to take care of her

The SHOW IS SOOOO FUNNY xD
